title: Butterfly Temple - Time of Mara (2005) *Russian Pagan Metal*
description:
Guest musicians:
- Manni Schmidt (Grave Digger) - guitar (track 2)
- Oleg Mission (Catharsis) - flute (tracks 2, 5, 7, 8, 9)
- Olga Dzusova - back vocals (tracks 1, 5, 6, 8, 9)
- Lesyar (Arkona (Rus) - vocals (track 10)

Track 10 actually consists of three tracks, "Podruga" itself and covers of
Moonspell&#039;s Werewolf Masquerade and Alma Mater

1.	Chertogi Bezmolviya/Neba Sleza (Halls of Silence/Tear of Sky)	06:40	
2.	Volchiy Pastyr (Pastor of Wolves)	05:52	
3.	Pesn Volnykh Vetrov (Song of Free Winds)	06:24	
4.	Vspomni Zabveniya Svet (Remember the Light of Oblivion)	04:32	
5.	Vremya Mary (Time of Mara)	05:05	
6.	Nochiu Hladom, Lunnym Svetom.. (Through Cold Nights, Moon Light)	05:31	
7.	Kolovorot (Kolovorot)	05:02	
8.	Vozvrashchenie (Return)	05:14	
9.	Trizna (Funeral Feast)	05:08	
10.	Podruga (Girlfriend) (Bonus Track)	16:20	
Total playing time	01:05:48
